title: Air Race E unveils ‘world’s first’ electric vertical motorsport
lead: The company plans to launch the world championship air race next year

title: Government urged to set 40GW solar target
lead: Group of NGOs suggests a solar boost could bring a range of environmental benefits

title: EDP to invest €24bn in energy transition
lead: The company targets 50GW of renewables and carbon-neutrality by 2030

title: Hackers attack npower’s app exposing customers’ data
lead: The hack accessed customers’ accounts using login data obtained by other websites

title: UK low carbon electricity hit record highs in 2020
lead: Fossil fuel production fell to an all-time low of 42%

title: Belgian firm granted €425m EU bank loan for smart meters rollout
lead: Fluvius, a co-operative company owned by 11 inter-municipal companies, has set a target to install smart meters at 80% of its clients’ sites by the end of 2024

title: Welsh Government appoints new environmental protection assessor
lead: The temporary position was created following the UK’s withdrawal from the European Union

title: Nearly 26% of drivers wrongly believe EVs are more pricey to run
lead: Just 5% plan to go electric in 2021, new report shows

title: Geothermal energy projects in the US receive $46m boost
lead: Enhanced geothermal systems are different from conventional geothermal resources that occur naturally in the US and are geographically limited due to the need for underground heat and fluids

title: Government considers e-waste obligation for online retailers
lead: By the end of 2021, online businesses may have to follow an equal obligation to collect old devices from customers
